paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the TTR gene, including penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The most prevalent TTR mutation worldwide is the Val30Met mutation and ATTR classically presents with peripheral neuropathy.

functional_data.summary: The Val30Met mutation is associated with a predominantly neurologic phenotype.

variants.population_frequency: 3-4% of African Americans in the United States.
variants.additional_notes: The Val30Met mutation is endemic in certain regions.
key_quotes: The most prevalent TTR mutation worldwide is the Val30Met mutation and ATTR classically presents with peripheral neuropathy.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: In the United States, the most common hereditary mutation is Val122Ile and organ involvement may be limited to the heart.

functional_data.summary: The Val122Ile mutation is associated with a predominantly cardiac phenotype.

variants.population_frequency: 3-4% of African Americans in the United States.
variants.additional_notes: The Val122Ile mutation often leads to disease primarily limited to the heart.
key_quotes: In the United States, the most common hereditary mutation is Val122Ile and organ involvement may be limited to the heart.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data extracted from the main text.
